game.name: Waddle Words
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
